snippet: The Marine Corps, in an experiment, will let women take the course that prepares lieutenants to lead infantry platoons into combat. It is a welcome step toward ending the injustice of banning women from direct ground fighting.
abstract: Editorial praises the Marine Corps for undertaking an experimental program that will let women take the grueling course that prepares lieutenants to lead infantry platoons into combat; contends that the move is a welcome step toward ending the injustice of banning women from direct ground fighting.
lead_paragraph: The Marine Corps, in an experiment, will let women take the course that prepares lieutenants to lead infantry platoons into combat. It is a welcome step toward ending the injustice of banning women from direct ground fighting.
